mapper.sql: SELECT id, title, name, type_id, local_id, price, content, writer, view_cnt, add_cnt, reg_date, up_date FROM danggeun
mapper.select: ORDER BY reg_date desc, id desc
WHERE type_id = #{type_id} ORDER BY reg_date desc, id desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO danggeun(title, name, type_id, local_id, price, content, writer) VALUES(#{title}, #{name}, #{type_id}, #{local_id}, #{price}, #{content}, #{writer})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM danggeun WHERE id=#{id} AND writer = #{writer}
